metadata.title: CVE-2021-30157 mediawiki: XSS due to unescaped messages used in HTML on ChangesList pages (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: In mediawiki package on ChangesList special pages such as Special:RecentChanges and Special:Watchlist, some of the rcfilters-filter-* label messages are outputted in HTML unescaped, which could leading to Cross-site Scripting (XSS). 
            STATEMENT: The mediawiki package was removed from OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) in version 4.3, therefore for OCP 4 has been marked as out of support scope.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
mediawiki is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
